New Records: Australia posted the highest-ever T20I powerplay total of 113 for one.
Key Match Events: Travis Head smashed 80 off 25 balls to help Australia cruise to a seven-wicket victory in Edinburgh.
George Munsey top scored for Scotland with 28.
Sean Abbott was the pick of the Australia bowlers with three for 39.
Mitch Marsh hit a 30-run over off Jack Jarvis.
Josh Inglis scored a quick-fire unbeaten 27 to help secure the victory.
